en_IN{
    %%Parent{"en_001"}
    NumberElements{
        latn{
            patterns{
                currencyFormat{"¤ #,##,##0.00"}
                decimalFormat{"#,##,##0.###"}
                percentFormat{"#,##,##0%"}
            }
            patternsShort{
                currencyFormat{
                    1000{
                        one{"¤0T"}
                        other{"¤0T"}
                    }
                    10000{
                        one{"¤00T"}
                        other{"¤00T"}
                    }
                    100000{
                        one{"¤0L"}
                        other{"¤0L"}
                    }
                    1000000{
                        one{"¤00L"}
                        other{"¤00L"}
                    }
                    10000000{
                        one{"¤0Cr"}
                        other{"¤0Cr"}
                    }
                    100000000{
                        one{"¤00Cr"}
                        other{"¤00Cr"}
                    }
                    1000000000{
                        one{"¤000Cr"}
                        other{"¤000Cr"}
                    }
                    10000000000{
                        one{"¤0TCr"}
                        other{"¤0TCr"}
                    }
                    100000000000{
                        one{"¤00TCr"}
                        other{"¤00TCr"}
                    }
                    1000000000000{
                        one{"¤0LCr"}
                        other{"¤0LCr"}
                    }
                    10000000000000{
                        one{"¤00LCr"}
                        other{"¤00LCr"}
                    }
                    100000000000000{
                        one{"¤000LCr"}
                        other{"¤000LCr"}
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    Version{"2.1.49.14"}
    calendar{
        generic{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a zzzz",
                "h:mm:ss a z",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE, d MMMM, y G",
                "d MMMM, y G",
                "d MMM, y G",
                "d/M/y/ GGGGG",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
            }
            availableFormats{
                GyMMM{"MMM, y G"}
                GyMMMEd{"E, d MMM, y G"}
                GyMMMd{"d MMM, y G"}
                Md{"d/M"}
                yyyyM{"M/y GGGGG"}
                yyyyMEd{"E, d/M/y GGGGG"}
                yyyyMMM{"MMM, y G"}
                yyyyMMMEd{"E, d MMM, y G"}
                yyyyMMMM{"MMMM, y G"}
                yyyyMMMd{"d MMM, y G"}
                yyyyMd{"d/M/y G"}
            }
            intervalFormats{
                MEd{
                    M{"E, dd/MM – E, dd/MM"}
                    d{"E, dd/MM – E, dd/MM"}
                }
                MMMEd{
                    M{"E, d MMM – E, d MMM"}
                    d{"E, d – E, d MMM"}
                }
                Md{
                    M{"d/M – d/M"}
                    d{"d/M – d/M"}
                }
                yM{
                    M{"MM/y – MM/y G"}
                    y{"MM/y – MM/y G"}
                }
                yMEd{
                    M{"E, dd/MM/y – E, dd/MM/y G"}
                    d{"E, dd/MM/y – E, dd/MM/y G"}
                    y{"E, dd/MM/y – E, dd/MM/y G"}
                }
                yMMMEd{
                    M{"E d MMM – E d MMM y G"}
                    d{"E d – E d MMM y G"}
                    y{"E d MMM y – E d MMM y G"}
                }
                yMd{
                    M{"dd/MM/y – dd/MM/y G"}
                    d{"dd/MM/y – dd/MM/y G"}
                    y{"dd/MM/y – dd/MM/y G"}
                }
            }
        }
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a zzzz",
                "h:mm:ss a z",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE, d MMMM, y",
                "d MMMM y",
                "dd-MMM-y",
                "dd/MM/yy",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
            }
            availableFormats{
                EHm{"E, HH:mm"}
                EHms{"E, HH:mm:ss"}
                Ehm{"E, h:mm a"}
                Ehms{"E, h:mm:ss a"}
                yMEd{"E, d/M/y"}
                yMMMEd{"E, d MMM, y"}
                yMd{"d/M/y"}
            }
            intervalFormats{
                MEd{
                    M{"E, dd/MM – E, dd/MM"}
                    d{"E, dd/MM – E, dd/MM"}
                }
                MMMEd{
                    M{"E, d MMM – E, d MMM"}
                    d{"E, d – E, d MMM"}
                }
            }
        }
        islamic{
            DateTimePatterns{
                "h:mm:ss a zzzz",
                "h:mm:ss a z",
                "h:mm:ss a",
                "h:mm a",
                "EEEE d MMMM y G",
                "d MMMM, y G",
                "dd-MMM-y G",
                "d/M/y/ GGGGG",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1} 'at' {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
                "{1}, {0}",
            }
            availableFormats{
                GyMMM{"MMM, y G"}
                GyMMMEd{"E, d MMM, y G"}
                GyMMMd{"d MMM, y G"}
                Md{"d/M"}
                yyyyM{"M/y GGGGG"}
                yyyyMEd{"E d/M/y G"}
                yyyyMMM{"MMM, y G"}
                yyyyMMMEd{"E, d MMM, y G"}
                yyyyMMMM{"MMMM, y G"}
                yyyyMMMd{"d MMM, y G"}
                yyyyMd{"d/M/y G"}
            }
            monthNames{
                stand-alone{
                    wide{
                        "Muharram",
                        "Safar",
                        "Rabiʻ I",
                        "Rabiʻ II",
                        "Jumada I",
                        "Jumada II",
                        "Rajab",
                        "Shaʻban",
                        "Ramadan",
                        "Shawwal",
                        "Dhuʻl-Qiʻdah",
                        "Dhuʻl-Hijjah",
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }
    fields{
        dayperiod{
            dn{"AM/PM"}
        }
    }
    listPattern{
        standard-narrow{
            end{"{0}, and {1}"}
        }
    }
}
